Body:
cosmo = ccl.Cosmology(Omega_c=0.25, Omega_b=0.05, h=0.7, sigma8=0.8, n_s=
    0.96, Neff=0, m_nu=0.0, w0=w0, wa=wa, T_CMB=2.7, m_nu_type='normal',
    Omega_g=0, Omega_k=0, transfer_function='bbks', matter_power_spectrum=
    'linear')
data = np.loadtxt('./benchmarks/data/model%d_pk.txt' % model)
k = data[:, (0)] * cosmo['h']
for i in range(6):
    a = 1.0 / (1.0 + i)
    pk = data[:, (i + 1)] / cosmo['h'] ** 3
    pk_ccl = ccl.linear_matter_power(cosmo, k, a)
    err = np.abs(pk_ccl / pk - 1)
    assert np.allclose(err, 0, rtol=0, atol=BBKS_TOLERANCE)
pytest.mark.parametrize('model,w0,wa', [(1, -1.0, 0.0), (2, -0.9, 0.0), (3,
    -0.9, 0.1)])
